useCase.name: Upload Inventory Files
useCase.description: Archivist uploads new inventory files to the system.

preconditions.precondition: Archivist is signed in to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Inventory files are successfully uploaded and updated in the system.

useCase.trigger: User wants to upload new inventory files.

mainSequence.step: Archivist signs in to the system.
Metadata and access rights are saved in the database.
Archivist uploads file(s) to the system.
Files are successfully stored in the archive.
Inventory list is updated in the database.
New entries are added to the archival collections.
Archivist is notified of successful upload.
Notification is sent to donor representatives.
